Description: Number of days in the crowd phase with optimal conditions for photosynthesis
label: PAD

Description: Risk for drought stress in crowd phase
label: risk drought

Description: Possible damage done by drought
label: damage drought

Description: Risk for disease related stress in crowd phase
label: risk disease

Description: Possible damage done by diesease
label: damage disease

Description: Risk for insect related stress in crowd phase
label: risk insects

Description: Possible damage done by insects
label: damage insects

Description: Risk for weather event related stress in crowd, e.g. heavy winds that breaks plant, heavy rain, hail
label: risk weather events

Description: Possible damage done by weather events
label: damage weather events

Description: Amount of chill needed by plant for optimal field emergence
label: chill need

Description: Amount of chill received this winter
label: chill received

Description: Day of the year the temperature induces growth start (Spear starts growing at 14 degree soil temp)
label: growth start

Description: Day of the year for the 24th of june, traditonal season end
label: season end

Description: optimal yield for area
label: standard yield

Description: optimal season length for area
label: standard season

Description: days how long the first spear grow till first harvest
label: speargrowth

Description: risk for late frost occurrence during spear growth
label: late frost

Description: possible damage done by late frost events during spear growth
label: frost damage

Description: risk for rapid temperature fluctuations that harm spear during spear growth
label: temp fluctuations

Description: possible damage done by rapid temp fluctuations
label: damage fluctuations

Description: risk for heavy rainfall events during harvest time that makes the harvest harder
label: extreme rain harvest

Description: Possible damage done by heavy rainfall events
label: damage rain

Description: risk for extreme heat events during harvest
label: extreme heat harvest

Description: Possible damage of extreme heat events during harvest
label: damage heat
